feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:39 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -11.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 06:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -11.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
